Derived module from sindybase.py for implicit SINDy

class pySINDy.isindy.ISINDy(name='SINDy model')

Bases: pySINDy.sindybase.SINDyBase

Implicit Sparse Identification of Nonlinear Dynamics (Inferring biological networks by sparse identification of nonlinear dynamics) reference: https://arxiv.org/pdf/1605.08368.pdf

static adm(null_space)
Parameters:null_space –
Returns:find a sparse representation
static build_theta_matrix(data, d_vec)
Parameters:
  • data – a 2D numpy array of features stored in each column
  • d_vec – a vector of time derivatives of a state
Returns:

a 2D numpy array expanded by the multiplication of data and d_vec
static expand_descriptions(desp, var_name=None)
fit(data, dt, poly_degree=2, deriv_acc=2)
Parameters:
  • data – dynamics data to be processed
  • dt – float, represents grid spacing
  • poly_degree – degree of polynomials to be included in theta matrix
  • deriv_acc – (positive) integer, derivative accuracy
Returns:

an implicit SINDy model

Parameters:theta – a 2D numpy array
Returns:a 2D numpy array representing the null space of theta
